text: Tell Rahal () is a village located northeast of the city of Aleppo in northern-central Aleppo Governorate, northwestern Syria. It is administratively part of Nahiya al-Bab in al-Bab District. The village had a population of 2,866 as per the 2004 census. ==Syrian Civil War== On 24 January 2017, the Syrian Army captured the village from Islamic State of Iraq and the Levant.Syrian Army liberates several villages in east Aleppo as ISIS falls apart ==References==
title: Tell Rahal
